alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 4:37PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Helena and northwestern Tangipahoa Parishes, Pike and eastern Amite Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 437 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kentwood, or 10 miles northeast of Greensburg, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mccomb, Magnolia, Kentwood, Summit, Osyka, Tangipahoa and Mccomb Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 56 and 66. Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
